item.description:

Remove “c.” from the code.[/quote]

No… Try again.

item.title: [PI] How to stop teleporting while in combat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @bobmich bobmich
item.description:
@bobmich wrote:

ranger squad:

Give me the home teleport.

//home teleports
			case 4171:
			case 50056:
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Talk to the @dre@Welcome to@blu@ DragonScape Home,", "@blu@enjoy the server alot of effort has been put into it", "@blu@Please donate to fund for our server VPS", "@blu@Thank You", "@blu@Killznodie");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3088, 3500, 0);
			break;

			case 117048:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Talk to the @dre@Mage Of Zamorak@blu@ at home,", "@blu@to be transported all over the isle/city", "@blu@he is the only way of transportaion", "@blu@he will be located in the middle", "@blu@have a good time, and play fair.");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3088, 3500, 0);
			break;
			
			case 50235:
			case 4140:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			//c.getPA().startTeleport(Config.LUMBY_X, Config.LUMBY_Y, 0, "modern");
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Fight all of the @dre@Rock Crabs@blu@ to earn RZP,", "@blu@RZP are also called @dre@RZ Points", "@blu@They are used to buy items at home @bla@[@dre@Chamber Guardian@bla@]", "@blu@You will get RZP from finishing a kill", "@blu@Getting your levels up.");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2646, 3710, 0);

			break;
			
			case 4143:
			case 50245:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Talk to the @dre@Mage Of Zamorak@blu@ at home,", "@blu@You may fight the lessers if you like,", "@blu@he is the only way of transportaion", "@blu@By clicking on the @dre@ladder@blu@ you will be teleported to a little isle", "@blu@By clicking the lever you will be teleported to the @dre@Kbd@blu@Lair.");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3006, 3850, 0);
			break;
			
			case 50253:
			case 4146:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3506, 9494, 0);
			break;
			

			case 51005:
			case 4150:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@This area is called @dre@Edgeville@blu@,", "@blu@It can be dangerous if you head @dre@north", "@blu@When you head @dre@north@blu@ you will enter the @dre@wilderness", "@blu@You will instantly hit @dre@Level 4 Danger", "@blu@make sure you have @dre@food, @dre@weapons, @blu@and @dre@armours.");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(3093, 3502, 0);
			break;			
			
			case 51013:
			case 6004:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getDH().sendOption5("@blu@Talk to the @dre@Mage Of Zamorak@blu@ to go home,", "@blu@Talk to @dre@Bob@blu@ for all skilling items", "@blu@To @dre@Farm@blu@You must head behind the bank to the tree patch", "@blu@Fishing spots have been moved closer to the bank", "@blu@You earn @dre@RZP@blu@ for skilling.");
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2804, 3421, 0);
			break; 
			

			case 6005:
			if (c.inWild())
			return;
			c.getPA().movePlayer(2900, 4449, 0);
			break;

item.title: [PI] How to stop teleporting while in combat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @bobmich bobmich
item.description:
@bobmich wrote:

[quote=“relmitos, post:2, topic:383624”]Add this in the startTeleport() method in the PlayerAssistant class:

if (c.underAttackBy > 0) { c.sendMessage(""); return; } [/quote]
I dont have startTeleport(),
i have

public void startTeleport(int x, int y, int height, String teleportType) {

and

	c.getPA().startTeleport(x, y, height, c.playerMagicBook == 1 ? "ancient" : "modern");

:S?

Read full topic
item.source: [PI] How to stop teleporting while in combat [PI]

item.title: [PI] How to stop teleporting while in combat [PI]
item.dc:creator: @relmitos relmitos
item.description:
@relmitos wrote:

Add this in the startTeleport() method in the PlayerAssistant class:

if (c.underAttackBy > 0) {
     c.sendMessage("");
     return;
}

Read full topic
